Description: Federation of a tenant allows businesses to operate in a hybrid configuration. These same features meant to empower an organization can be abused by attackers to execute malicious actions and maintain access to the Tenant.
Remediation: Examine the exported configuration and determine if all settings are correct for the Tenant. Modify as needed to mitigate risk of abuse.
